contents.text: If you want to get something done quickly , it’s a good idea to spend some time getting the prper inforaton fist . If you don’t , you’ll generally spend more time doing it in the end . With  pay telephone calls , you may spend more money , too . Adam’s story is an example .
contents.text_zh: 磨刀不误砍柴工，如果你在做一件事之前没有花时间去收集准确的信息，那么你只会在后面浪费更多的精力。你有可能会在电话费上花更多的钱，亚当的故事就是一个例子。

contents.text: Adam is a sophomore at Tinghua University , majoring civil engineein . His girl friend Rebecca goes to Beijing Institute of International Relations and studies accounting .
contents.text_zh: 不亚当是清华大学土木工程专业的一名大二的学生。他的女朋友蕾贝卡在北京国际关系学院会计学专业。

contents.text: On Thursday night , Adam tried to make a phone call to Rebecca about their date of the weekend .
contents.text_zh: 一个星期四的晚上，亚当正在给蕾贝卡打电话商量周末约会的事。

contents.text: When Adam met Rebecca three months ago , he wrote her telephone number on the back of his calculus notebook . He never memorized it because he almost always carris the notebook with him . But Thursday night he didn’ t have the notebook with him.
contents.text_zh: 当亚当3个月前遇到蕾贝卡的时候，他将她的电话号码记在了他的算术笔记本背面。他从来不记她的电话号码，因为他几乎天天带着他的笔记本。但是这个星期四的晚上他却忘带了。

contents.text: He went to the public telephone booth and called the general telephone number of the institute where Rebecca studies . The night operator at the institute didn’ t have a list of students and their numbers . She told him to try the dormitory and gave him the number . But Adam accidentally dialed the wrong number and woke up an old lady , who threatened to call the police .
contents.text_zh: 他来到公用电话亭，拨了一个蕾贝卡所在学院的总机号。学院夜班接线员没有学生的名单和电话，她告诉亚当去打寝室电话并告诉了他电话号码。但是亚当不小心拨错了号码，吵醒了一位老太太，这位老太太威胁说要叫警察。后来，亚当很仔细的又拨了一次，这次是拨对了，但却是男生寝室。接电话的学生告诉亚当另一个电活号码。

contents.text: Adam careflly dialed the number again , this time correctly , but it was the men’s dormitory . The guy who answered gave Adam another number to call .Adam dialed this number , and a girl answered . He asked to speak to Rebecca , but the girl said, “Rebecca lives in the dorm , but not on this floor .This is the third floor,  and she lives on the eight” After a delay , she was able to find the number for the eighth floor . He dialed this number .
contents.text_zh: 亚当拨了这个号码，一个女生接了电话。亚当请蕾贝卡接电话，但是那个女生说：“蕾贝卡的确住在寝室，但是不在我这一楼。我这是3楼，她住在八楼。”耽误了ー会儿，她终于找到了8楼的电话号码。亚当又拨了这个电话。

contents.text: Another girl answered the telephone . Adam again asked to speak to Rebecca . and the girl yelled , “Just a minute ... Hey , Rebecca!    It’s for you ！”Five minutes went by . Then someone hung the phone up . He impatiently dialed the number again . and this time Rebecca finally answered .
contents.text_zh: 这一回是另一个女生接了电话。亚当又请蕾贝卡接电话，这个女生叫着回答；“等一下…唉，蕾贝卡，你的电话！”5分钟之后有个人把电话给挂了。于是，亚当又打了过去，这一次，终于是蕾贝卡接了电话。

contents.text: Adam spent two yuan for the call that night !
contents.text_zh: 那天晚上亚当整整花了两元钱打电话。
